title: New: Galapagos – Feel Things Inside
content:
18-year-old Phoenician Jacob McNaughton, aka Galapagos has been turning heads in the blog world for a little while now. In a word where moody and drug-infused Rn’B is all the rage, it’s actually pretty refreshing to hear someone go out of his way to create something as clean and sugary as possible. His new cut, Feel Things Inside, is a rework of Jennifer Hudson‘s “No One Gonna Love You”. It’s almost obnoxiously pitch-shifted, stuttering and wild, yet it also manages to be utterly infectious.

Stream and D/L below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
